# Snippet Component

### Snippet

**Exports:**
- `CodeSnippet` - Code snippet display component

**Usage:**
```svelte
<script lang="ts">
	import { CodeSnippet } from 'kampsy-ui';
</script>

<CodeSnippet text="npm init next-app" class="w-full lg:w-[300px]"/>
```

## Installation

```bash
pnpm i -D kampsy-ui@latest
```

## Documentation

Visit http://ui.kampsy.xyz/snippet for full documentation and examples.
